title: Houkago no Pleiades (TV)
alternative_title: Wish Upon the Pleiades, 放課後のプレアデス
description: Subaru is a young girl who discovers that her best friend Aoi is part of magical group trying to gather engine fragments so that a little being from Pleiades can return to his home. Subaru considers joining them as she was chosen by the Pleiadian, president of this afterschool club.
